definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: I really want to know what fans they really asked.
sentences.chinese: 我很想知道他们到底问的什么黑粉？

sentences.english: In other smuts the spores form an uncovered mass of black powder.
sentences.chinese: 在另一些黑粉病中孢子形成无覆盖的黑色粉末。

sentences.english: Smuts Plant diseases caused by basidiomycete fungi of the order Ustilaginales.
sentences.chinese: 是一种由于担子菌纲黑粉菌目的真菌引起的植物疾病。

sentences.english: The photocopier This makes copies, using a mirror, a roller and special black powder.
sentences.chinese: 复印机用一面镜子，一个滚筒和专门的黑粉可以复印。

sentences.english: Among flour beetles, males routinely force themselves on other males.
sentences.chinese: 在黑粉虫中间，雄性常常强迫自己和其他的雄性搭线。

sentences.english: The Dermestidae belongs to another family.
sentences.chinese: 属于黑粉菌科的一个属。

definition: bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
fan of one particular member of a pop idol band who denigrates and defames the other members
fan who only likes one particular member of a pop idol band
(Internet slang) to go from being an admirer to being a detractor
(Internet slang) to make fun of oneself
peanut gallery (esp. in online forums)/onlookers who are interested in the spectacle but don't have anything knowledgeable to say about it/(neologism c. 2016)
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
